io.netty.channel

Class ChannelHandlerInvokerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerInvokerUtil

  • public final class ChannelHandlerInvokerUtil
extends Object
    A set of helper methods for easier implementation of custom ChannelHandlerInvoker implementation.
